text: Each player discards 2 card, mills 2 card, and sacrifices a creature, enchantment and artifact
Each player sacrifices 1 legendary permanent and {x} creatures
The Raid Monster deals 10 damage to every player and 5 to every planeswalker
The Raid Monster gains 10 life and removes 5 poison counters
Until the beginning of the Monster`s next turn, players cannot draw more than 1 card or play more than one spell each turn
Each player sacrifices all tokens they control. (Except for the raid monster)
Place {x+1} {x}/{x} flying defender creature tokens in front of the Raid Monster
Each player exiles their graveyard and drain {x} life, raid monster gains {xp} life
Each player may immediately draw a card OR place a land from their hand into play OR gain 5 life
